config.neo4j.topic.cypher.users_topic:
MERGE (u:User {id: 'user_' + toString(event.user_id)}) SET u += event WITH u 
MERGE (p:PostalCode {id: u.postal_code}) 
MERGE (u)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(p)
config.neo4j.topic.cypher.listings_topic:
MERGE (l:Listing {id: 'listing_' + toString(event.listing_id)}) SET l += event, l.latitude = toFloat(event.location_lat), l.longitude = toFloat(event.location_lon) WITH l 
MERGE (p:PostalCode {id: l.postal_code}) 
MERGE (l)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(p)
